history.proof: hauto lq: on use: divTerm_nZ inv: divP.

ctx: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
exceptions.tactic: unfold zeroP, divP, zeroP in zP_b.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce divP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
exceptions.tactic: destruct divP_ab as [a b nza eqab].
exceptions.exn: The reference divP_ab was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (nzeroP_multTerm A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n a b nza nZb) as [nza|nzb].
exceptions.exn: The reference nza was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
exceptions.exn: The reference nza was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb.
exceptions.exn: The reference nzb was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a b nZb divP_ab nZaZb. intro zP_b. unfold zeroP, divP, zeroP in zP_b. destruct divP_ab as [a b nza eqab]. destruct (nzeroP_multTerm A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n a b nza nZb) as [nza|nzb]. - apply nza. - apply (nzb eqab).
